experiences.description: Development of the frontend development platform, used by hundreds of engineers to develop, build and deploy frontend apps to production. This platform offers generic frontend libraries, development tooling as well as CI/CD pipelines for the frontend.
experiences.title: Frontend Engineer at Rabobank
